metadata.description: 15-year old Magic McAllistair lives in a world full of fantastic beasts, powerful wizards, and dangerous adventures, yet all she wants to do is stay in her bedroom and listen to punk rock music. But when teenagers begin to get trapped inside their sorcery social media accounts, who better to solve "The Curse of the Hashtag Medusa" than Magic, the only girl in the entire world who has never smiled in a selfie?
metadata.name: No Room For Magic
